statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ 10 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ -6 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ 10 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
